cu.explanation_en: Setting the tracking area code to a negative value -1 will cause configuration validation failure and prevent the CU from initializing properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the tracking area code to a negative value -1 will cause configuration validation failure and prevent the DU from initializing properly.
du.explanation_zh: 將追蹤區域代碼設定為負值 -1 會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止 DU 正確初始化。
